titleStmt.title: Just measures in an epistle of peace & love to such professors of truth as are under any dissatisfaction about the present order practis'd in the church of Christ / by a lover of the truth and them, G.P.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Penn by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
